title: "Olaf Sucks"

embed.description: 환영착검 - 올라프 두게임 하이라이트 영상 / Olaf Highlights League of Legends / lol / lol Highlights 리그오브레전드 / 롤 / 롤 하이라이트

body: Or you just don't know how to play him

replies.body: Or maybe people forgot how to play against him and are getting rekt by a cheese pick.
Or a Korean is playing him. O.o

Koreans are playing every other champ in the game too, I really fail to see your point. Even if we assume that Koreans are genetically better at videogames, a Korean Jarvan should be stronger than a Korean Olaf if they both knew what the other one does and used the counter patterns available. Like not trying to run in a way that gives him free axe resets. He should've just went down into the river and Olaf would either have to abandon his axe or take a pretty big detour.

I'm not going to get into the reasons as to why Koreans tend to be better at videogames. The fact is that they do. But that's not the point of the thread. If you missed my point, I'll pat you on the head and let you go on your way.

Not to offend anybody, but really,

This looks like a game in bronze to silver elo bracket (maybe up to gold), which ofc if played well enough Olaf should prevail, what about high elo tho.

I didn't know the Olaf is in Master though, 

Just seriously look at what it is shown on the clip alone, then compare to your daily spectate in normal games (or around low - mid elo range), they really do look similar to me.

Maybe this guy is just too cool everyone else just went ape against him.

dont know how to play olaf...?
all this guy is doing is throwing axes at people, run up to em and slap em with lightning
really, I see very little mechanic outside of being able to land a skill shot 90% of the time
so the odds are, its not cuz no one knows how to play hm
but MAAAYBE its just the people he is up against who suck

Yeah Korean Master tier is where the plebs go to play

Not only that. but you have no idea what you are talking about

I see an axe totin barb throwing it around with accuracy, that's literally it
do I really need to point to specific clips of the vid and make lcs commentary bout it?
-HE THROWS THE AXE,  DOES HE HIT IT? YES! HE LANDS THAT AXE
HE'S RUNNING UP FOR THE KILL NOW!
